CustomField.description: Set to an Acrobat Sign group to which the Salesforce org is locked. If left blank or an invalid Sign group name is entered, the user will see all Sign groups from which he/she can send an agreement.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set to an Acrobat Sign group to which the Salesforce org is locked. If left blank or an invalid Sign group name is entered, the user will see all Sign groups from which he/she can send an agreement.
CustomField.label: Locked Acrobat Sign Group Name
